reviews.review:
[h1]Это только начало...[/h1]

Half Life 2: episode 1 - это прямое продолжение событий второй части.
Героев от взрыва спасают таинственные вертигонты и протагонист после этого оказывается под обломками Цитадели. Приключения Аликс Вэнс и Гордона Фримена продолжаются и теперь мы должны вернуться в крепость Альянса на Земле, которая сыпется как карточный домик, чтобы предотвратить катастрофу...

[h1]Что нового сделала игра?[/h1]

Движок данной части серии "Периода Полураспада" остался тот же, что и у основной игры. Та же графика, физика и оружие.
Нельзя не отметить, что игра раскрывает отношения Гордона Фримена с Аликс, что даёт "+" в копилку целостности вселенной "Полураспада". Мы можем наблюдать за второстепенной героиней и увидеть, чем вызвана её ненависть к "Альянсу", а именно тем, как она столкнулась лицом к лицу со сталкерами, которые в прошлом были людьми, но Альянс с них сделал ужасных существ...
Также, есть новые враги, но какие - я спойлерить не стану.

[h1]Личные ощущения[/h1]

Сюжет не хуже второй части, но есть жирный минус - непростительно короткое повествование. Из-за этого, я полностью прошёл игру всего лишь за 4 часа. Такое чувство, что горели сроки и сюжет решили укоротить.
Но не взирая на это, это достойная игра, которая стоит вашего внимания

2편에 비해서는 너무 단조로워서 금방 질리네요.
마지막 한글 더빙이라서 할만합니다.
하지만 1편보다 더 어둡고 보조전원이 너무 빨리 닳아요.

새로나온 해드크랩 깨애액!하는 소리 때문에 징그러워서 하루에 30분 이상 플레이 못하겠어요 ㅠㅠ
개인적으론 하프라이프2랑 에피2가 맵 볼륨도 크고 무기의 다양함을 즐길 수 있지만 에피1은 무기도 너무 늦게 나오고 플레이가 단조롭게 볼륨이 작아서 아쉽습니다.

Неплохо, но косяки из оригинала остались и это печально.

BEST. ENDING. EVER!!! This Episode kinda felt short after Half Life 2, but I'd say this ending still remains one of the best ones from the whole series, I wrote this review after finishing Episode 2 so I'm pretty confident that this, is still the best ending yet. For the game, I pretty much recommend it, yeah that's all I'm gonna say. 8.5/10, 17/10 for the ending

The newest, Episode Two, combines the excitement, variety, and spectacular level design of the original with the character and story development of Episode One creating an amazing package that anybody who played Half-Life 2 should gobble up as soon as possible whether that be alone or in the Orange Box.

Get it together with Half-Life² on discount and you're fine. 

Game is cool, not as good and fun as Half-Life² itself and only 1/4th of playtime, though i played on hard and for the "The One Free Bullet"-Staem-achievement only used the gravity-gun, rocket launchers and other allowed weapons. 
I still lack 4 achievements and won't replay the game to attempt them, not even on easy.
If you played HL2 then you should play HL2:E1. Short but more half life fun.

Storywise it is pretty good.
to jest tak chujowa gra że kurwa Idze tak się wkurwić w ostatniej misji no KURWA a ta bazooka to trzeba patrzeć na pocisk żeby dobrze leciał nieda się pickować JP
devamı her şekilde acı veriyor ama gzl
半条命2的续章，描述了逃离17号城市的过程，流程较短，趣味性不错，但玩法相对单一，建议通关原作后再游玩

While I still recommend this game, it was definitely the most underwhelming Half-Life experience by far.  The story is nothing special and the levels are a bit repetitive and annoying.  Especially in the beginning when you have to walk around pitch black zombie infested sewers with no guns.  

It was a pretty whatever story, probably 6/10 honestly.  But I still recommend it if you're gonna play Half-Life 2 obviously since it IS part of the story.

08年左右看xyz的第一章第二章攻略视频了解的半条命，那时候就被物理效果和场景吸引了。现在大学里终于买了正版补票，总算是了却一桩心愿。今天专门通了一弹逃脱成就，顺便推荐一下。

半条命的游戏设计我一直认为是顶尖的，这一部大致有着破损城堡，地下车库，地表城市这几种场景，场景丰富，玩下来也没有重复感和疲劳感。在战斗之余也有一定的物理解密，重力枪的使用频率我私认为比玩前作时要高，尤其是一弹逃脱术的成就一看就知道游戏想让你往利用场景和重力枪战斗的方向发展，提示玩家除了枪还有其他武器，增添了趣味性也开辟了一条不同于大多数射击游戏的路子。

如果说第一章很棒，那我觉得第二章更棒，非常希望以后能玩到其他续作!

Reseña Episodio 1:
-Puntuación 8/10
-Si bien este capitulo es digno de ser de la saga de half life la verdad es que se queda corto comparando con el mismo episodio 2 y half life 2 
-Jugabilidad: Esta Bien,Lo que sí va a llegar un punto en que te vas a cansar de disparar todo el dia,Si,Y se que este justamente es un juego de disparos pero el capítulo 2 y el mismo hl2 sabían regular los momentos de acción y momentos tranquilos,Sin embargo en cuanto los combates si son necesarios lo hace muy bien el juego
-Historia:Uno de sus puntos mas fuertes en este capitulo y en general de la saga es la narrativa,Es simplemente excelente.
-Graficos:Se nota una notable diferencia grafica con respecto al half life 2 y es muy buena
-Banda sonora:Increible 
Simplemente un juegazo.
Short but very sweet, a solid follow up to Half Life 2!
you aren't missing anything worth paying for

Неча на Аликс пенять, коли гравипушка крива =))
For an "episode" it isn't very cinematic

oyunu bitirdim, 4 saate ama siz bu oyunu 2 saat gibi de bitirebilirsiniz. yani half life 2 nasıl benim için şaheser bir oyunsa, buda öyledir. iyiki kütüphanemde half life episode two da var. onuda oynayıp bitirdikten sonra o oyunlada alakalı inceleme yazarım. benim bu oyuna puanım 10/9 gerçi half life 2`yede 10/9 verdim ki bu oyunuda aldığımda, half life 2 deathmatch oyunun yanında gelmesi de ayrı bir güzel. :)
момент со взрывом цитадели самый топовый!

I really enjoyed this adventure. Once the action gets going in EP1 it never relents and the finale was a great culmination of what essentially is an action movie in video game form, I loved it.

My only complain is that Gordon is always accompanied by someone, even though the game is at its best when it's just Gordon and the enemies. And sometimes you spend a little too much time waiting for your companion Alyx to finish talking and get on with the gameplay.

 On the other hand though, the game switches the normal Half-Life formula up, and instead of it just being a shooter it does things a little differently in the beginning by forcing you to assist Alyx rather than disposing of the enemies yourself. In one area for example you are in a completely dark room and you use your flashlight to reveal enemies which Alyx then shoots. So mixing it up like this was a move I appreciated. Pretty funny to realise YOU'RE the side character.

Overall the game was only three hours long but felt like six hours because you can really tell valve poured all of their creative energy into this really short but really sweet experience. It is meticulously designed.

Also I don't know if it's better textures, more detailed enviroments or if the disproportionally beautifull skybox tricked me but the episodes look better graphically than HL2.

The year is 2050: Gabe Newell, age 88, co-founder of digital distribution, video game developing and publishing company Valve is asked by a reporter:

"The fans really enjoyed Half Life: Alyx, is there any plans to make Half Life: 3 or HL2 ep 3?"

Gaben: "I really don't have anything to say about episode 3 right now, but when we do we'll certainly let people know."
Me parece una gran expansión en la que debemos ayudar a la resistencia a escapar de ciudad 17, me agrada completar los logros.

Yes, well maybe, it's a 8/10. First off it's a very short game, it dosen't take long to complete the game. If your saying episode 1 is the first Half-Life game you played, then at that point I feel bad for you, start off with Half-Life 2 it's more longer and funner than this, Hell even The first game. Overall it's pretty good, I really hate the final part of the game it felt very unfair sometimes. Will you play this if it was your first Half-Life game? No! I would start off with Half-Life 2.
Corta pero una verdadera joyita por jugar........y debes jugar el episodio 2!!

Half-Life 2: Episode One
Es una entrega corta pero bastante explicativa en cuanto lore y historia para el episode 2 supongo, lo malo es que es necesario tener el contexto de half life 2, por lo cual no recomiendo su compra individual, pero dudo que alguien no tenga este juego o compre individualmente los juegos de valve, o que alguien lea esta reseña.
Sobre el juego aunque tiene algunas innovaciones con respecto a la entrega principal (half life 2) carece en los demás aspectos, además no creo que la manera episódica fuera la mejor manera de sacar el juego en ese momento, pero bueno. Sobre la historia es la continuación del 2 así que eso, no voy a hacer spoilers  asi que no voy a hablar de eso, solo quería dejar claros esos puntos, no vale como compra individual, es muy corto y aporta pocas cosas más que un poco más de lore y contexto supongo para la parte 2, con esta información fíjate si te conviene comprarlo o piratearlo.
its like half life 2 but more
